issue.title: [R] Disallow expressions that depend on order
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13779](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13779). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because in the current ExecPlan, sorting is only done in the end (in a sink node), we can't sort the data and then do an operation that depends on sorting (like cumsum) without first calling compute(). (This is probably not yet a concern because don't seem to have any kernels that require order.)
